AttributeList.Text: Setpoint: dP,dR for the re-melting phase (classic)

If the MR-, Sw-controllers will configured for the physical units, we can use more simple calculation for P, R. The output configuration for MR-cont can be power [kW], or a power changing [kW/min] The output configuration for Sw-cont can be resistance [mOhm], or a resistance changing [mOhm/min]
A new bonus is smooth process regulation.
Setpoint: dP,dR for the re-melting phase (new)
Prepare starting point for HT-phase setpoints
Setpoint: P,R for the hottopping phase
NB A problem can happen if P_act = 0 (CB is OFF, electrode is out)

During OCT the cos(phi) is always 1, and this fact does a voltage calculation wrong. To avoid this we will use special seed for resistance R! R! = Rmin / cos_phi^2 For this plant cos_phi = 0.2 and Rmin = 0.5 mOhm R! = 0.5 / 0,04 = 12,5 mOhm
